cheatsheet.title: Generating links to your existing data

intro.description: Whilst Debrief NG stores it's data in a local folder called a Workspace, it's possible to add links to your existing data directories

item.title: Check Navigator is open
item.description: In the top left hand corner of Debrief you should find the Navigator window. If is isn't there, select "Navigator" from Debrief's Window/Show View menu.

item.title: Add a new Folder
item.description: Right-click in the Navigator view, and select 'Folder'. The New Folder wizard will open.

item.title: Show the Advanced options
item.description: Click the 'Advanced' button to display the Advanced options.

item.title: Linking to an existing folder
item.description: Click on the 'Link to folder in the file system', and navigate to the target folder

item.title: Done
item.description: Well done, there you are. Just repeat this process to add any other data directories you want to load data from.
